com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.velocity

Interface VelocityProperties


  • public interface VelocityProperties
    Components which use the VelocityLayout may implement this interface, in which case the Map given in the getVelocityMap function will be installed into the VelocityContext.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    James Gifford

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map getVelocityMap()
      Retrieves a map of key/value pairs to be installed into the VelocityContext.
      void mapUsed()
      This method will be called after the VelocityLayout has painted the template.

    • Method Detail

      • getVelocityMap

        Map getVelocityMap()
        Retrieves a map of key/value pairs to be installed into the VelocityContext.
        Returns:
        the map to be inserted into the velocity context.

      • mapUsed

        void mapUsed()
        This method will be called after the VelocityLayout has painted the template. Implementations may clear the map at this point, since Velocity has done its thing.
